title: docs.rs documentation is broken
body:
(And thus the main link for the repo leads to a broken page.)

https://docs.rs/crate/rand/0.5.0-pre.1/builds/96774

```
$ rustc --version
rustc 1.26.0-dev (0eb87c9bf 2018-03-16)
$ cratesfyi --version
cratesfyi 0.5.0 (579f83b 2018-03-05)
$ cratesfyi ...
    Updating registry `https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index`
 Downloading rand v0.5.0-pre.1
       Fresh libc v0.2.40
       Fresh cfg-if v0.1.2
       Fresh unicode-xid v0.1.0
       Fresh serde v1.0.42
       Fresh log v0.4.1
       Fresh proc-macro2 v0.3.6
       Fresh quote v0.5.2
       Fresh syn v0.13.1
       Fresh serde_derive_internals v0.23.1
       Fresh serde_derive v1.0.42
   Compiling rand_core v0.1.0
     Running `rustc --crate-name rand_core .cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand_core-0.1.0/src/lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 --cfg 'feature="serde"' --cfg 'feature="alloc"' --cfg 'feature="serde1"' --cfg 'feature="std"' --cfg 'feature="serde_derive"' -C metadata=0cdd7e83ebe58e22 -C extra-filename=-0cdd7e83ebe58e22 --out-dir /home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps -L dependency=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps --extern serde=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde-b7165abe2727e904.rlib --extern-version serde=serde,1.0.42 --extern serde_derive=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde_derive-53ec112cc1d03418.so --extern-version serde_derive=serde_derive,1.0.42 --cap-lints allow`
 Documenting rand v0.5.0-pre.1
     Running `rustdoc --crate-name rand .cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand-0.5.0-pre.1/src/lib.rs -o /home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/doc --cfg 'feature="serde_derive"' --cfg 'feature="i128_support"' --cfg 'feature="fuchsia-zircon"' --cfg 'feature="serde"' --cfg 'feature="nightly"' --cfg 'feature="cloudabi"' --cfg 'feature="rand_core"' --cfg 'feature="libc"' --cfg 'feature="log"' --cfg 'feature="winapi"' --cfg 'feature="alloc"' --cfg 'feature="serde1"' --cfg 'feature="stdweb"' --cfg 'feature="std"' --cfg 'feature="default"' -Z unstable-options --resource-suffix -20180316-1.26.0-dev-0eb87c9bf --all -L dependency=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps --extern rand_core=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/librand_core-0cdd7e83ebe58e22.rlib --extern-version rand_core=rand_core,0.1.0 --extern log=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/liblog-9a2384ac12322a5f.rlib --extern-version log=log,0.4.1 --extern serde_derive=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde_derive-53ec112cc1d03418.so --extern-version serde_derive=serde_derive,1.0.42 --extern serde=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde-b7165abe2727e904.rlib --extern-version serde=serde,1.0.42 --extern libc=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/liblibc-9cee711a75827cff.rlib --extern-version libc=libc,0.2.40`
rustdoc: Unrecognized option: 'all'
Try 'rustdoc --help' for more information.
thread 'main' panicked at 'Error(
    CargoError(
        ChainedError {
            error: Could not document `rand`.,
            cause: process didn't exit successfully: `rustdoc --crate-name rand .cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand-0.5.0-pre.1/src/lib.rs -o /home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/doc --cfg feature="serde_derive" --cfg feature="i128_support" --cfg feature="fuchsia-zircon" --cfg feature="serde" --cfg feature="nightly" --cfg feature="cloudabi" --cfg feature="rand_core" --cfg feature="libc" --cfg feature="log" --cfg feature="winapi" --cfg feature="alloc" --cfg feature="serde1" --cfg feature="stdweb" --cfg feature="std" --cfg feature="default" -Z unstable-options --resource-suffix -20180316-1.26.0-dev-0eb87c9bf --all -L dependency=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps --extern rand_core=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/librand_core-0cdd7e83ebe58e22.rlib --extern-version rand_core=rand_core,0.1.0 --extern log=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/liblog-9a2384ac12322a5f.rlib --extern-version log=log,0.4.1 --extern serde_derive=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde_derive-53ec112cc1d03418.so --extern-version serde_derive=serde_derive,1.0.42 --extern serde=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/libserde-b7165abe2727e904.rlib --extern-version serde=serde,1.0.42 --extern libc=/home/cratesfyi/cratesfyi/debug/deps/liblibc-9cee711a75827cff.rlib --extern-version libc=libc,0.2.40` (exit code: 1)
        }
    ),
    State {
        next_error: None,
        backtrace: None
    }
)', src/bin/cratesfyi.rs:142:13
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.
```

It appears that you've asked docs.rs to pass `--all` to `rustdoc`:

https://github.com/rust-lang-nursery/rand/blob/7fcd3d921d84a6bc1bd95776ffd25b13d92ec6a9/Cargo.toml#L58-L60

`--all` is not an argument that `rustdoc` takes; only `cargo doc` knows how to interpret `--all`. docs.rs generates documentation separately for each crate published; [`rand_core`'s documentation](https://docs.rs/rand_core/0.1.0/rand_core/) is built fine.

cc @pitdicker to whom git assigns the blame e0e7a3cd63502f7ba2b0f40edb7aed1c0924f7f1
